00009     LHEReader::LHEReader(std::string& filename) {
00010         std::cout << "Opening LHE file " << filename << std::endl;
00011         ifs_.open(filename.c_str(), std::ifstream::in);
00012     }

00014     LHEReader::~LHEReader() {

00018     LHEEvent* LHEReader::readNextEvent() {
00019 
00020         std::string line;
00021         bool foundEventElement = false;
00022         while (getline(ifs_, line)) {
00023             if (line == "<event>") {
00024                 foundEventElement = true;
00025                 break;
00026             }
00027         }
00028 
00029         if (!foundEventElement) {
00030             std::cerr << "WARNING: No next <event> element was found by the LHE reader." << std::endl;
00031             return NULL;
00032         }
00033 
00034         getline(ifs_, line);
00035 
00036         LHEEvent* nextEvent = new LHEEvent(line);
00037 
00038         while (getline(ifs_, line)) {
00039 
00040             if (line == "</event>") {
00041                 break;
00042             }
00043 
00044             LHEParticle* particle = new LHEParticle(line);
00045             nextEvent->addParticle(particle);
00046         }
00047 
00048         const std::vector<LHEParticle*>& particles = nextEvent->getParticles();
00049         int particleIndex = 0;
00050         for (std::vector<LHEParticle*>::const_iterator it = particles.begin(); it != particles.end(); it++) {
00051             LHEParticle* particle = (*it);
00052             if (particle->getMOTHUP(0) != 0) {
00053                 int mother1 = particle->getMOTHUP(0);
00054                 int mother2 = particle->getMOTHUP(1);
00055                 if (mother1 > 0) {
00056                     particle->setMother(0, particles[mother1 - 1]);
00057                 }
00058                 if (mother2 > 0) {
00059                     particle->setMother(1, particles[mother2 - 1]);
00060                 }
00061             }
00062             ++particleIndex;
00063         }
00064 
00065         return nextEvent;
00066     }
00067 
00068 }
